name: Risk Rolled
description:
Risk Rolled is a tower defense game that specializes in dice rolls. You can attack enemies by throwing dice, which will activate different attacks to the increasing amount of enemies. Protect the tower with all your luck!

Controls
Left click = Attack
A = Rotate Left
D = Rotate Right
Escape = Pause Menu
